name: Suger
headline: Salesforce for Cloud marketplaces on AWS, Azure, GCP
description: The cloud marketplaces on AWS, Azure, and GCP have become the App Store for B2B software products. It’s growing close to 100% year-over-year since it gives software sellers access to cloud budgets and makes procurement 40% faster. The core problem is the cloud marketplace is hard to navigate and requires an upfront technical investment without knowing the expected ROI. Suger eliminates the need to reinvent the wheel with your own engineering resource or spend a fortune on consulting-based solutions.

# All your Cloud Marketplaces in one place
Fastest and easiest way to list, transact and co-sell on cloud marketplaces.
[ GET STARTED ](https://www.suger.io/<https:/console.suger.io/login>) [ LEARN MORE ](https://www.suger.io/<https:/www.suger.io/why-suger?hsLang=en>)
![Suger Overview](https://www.suger.io/hubfs/Group%20211%20\(1\)-1.png)
Co-Sell
### Drive deal support and co-sell with AWS, Azure, GCP
Accept or reject referrals from cloud providers directly within your CRM.
Offer
### Simplify offer management to accelerate sales
Whether it’s a referral from a sales team, or a public offer, use Suger to manage the full lifecycle of a sales motion.
Metering & Billing
### Let’s transact on cloud marketplace
We convert raw usage events to billed amounts with correct batching, dimension mapping, among many others.
BIG PICTURE 
### Join the B2B Cloud Marketplace Revolution
Let’s transact on cloud marketplace. Suger is the only API-first SaaS technology solution with out of the box integrations with key transactional tools.
[ LET'S CHAT ](https://www.suger.io/<https:/www.suger.io/schedule-demo?hsLang=en>) [ LEAR MORE ](https://www.suger.io/<https:/www.suger.io/blog/tag/case-studies?hsLang=en>)
![Group 229](https://www.suger.io/hs-fs/hubfs/Group%20229.png?width=2000&height=924&name=Group%20229.png)
POWERFUL FEATURES 
## Unlock access to AWS, Azure and GCP Marketplace
![](https://www.suger.io/hubfs/raw_assets/public/@marketplace/kalungicom/atlas-theme/images/Codepen.svg)
#### AI listings
Quickly create and manage marketplace listings with zero engineer effort
![](https://www.suger.io/hubfs/raw_assets/public/@marketplace/kalungicom/atlas-theme/images/Pen.svg)
#### Private offers
Customize private offers from your CRM or CPQ with flexible pricing and terms
![](https://www.suger.io/hubfs/raw_assets/public/@marketplace/kalungicom/atlas-theme/images/Activity.svg)
#### Usage Metering
Flexible pricing model configuration, custom filters, and a smoother billing operation
![Group 14900551](https://www.suger.io/hubfs/Group%2014900551.png)
#### Revenue Reports
Gain insights into your buyers, analyze trends, and optimize sales performance
![](https://www.suger.io/hubfs/raw_assets/public/@marketplace/kalungicom/atlas-theme/images/Database.svg)
#### Flexible APIs 
Integrate seamlessly with CRM, billing, and other tools in your existing workflow
TESTIMONIALS 
## What our customers say
“We had a burning need to get on the AWS and GCP marketplaces in a short period of time with no engineering lift due to time-sensitive deals. Suger successfully met the timeline and provided great support.” 
![111-1](https://www.suger.io/hubfs/111-1.jpg)
Astrix Security 
“Suger has made marketplace transactions very simple for sellers. Suger provides us a single pane of glass to transact and manage our cloud marketplace operations, saving countless hours for the team.”
![21992475](https://www.suger.io/hubfs/21992475.png)
Pulumi 
“Suger portal is easy to use, provides great reporting and integrates naturally with AWS ACE as well as our own CRM. Their support is helping us optimize our AWS experience co-selling in the field.”
![teleport_symbol@4](https://www.suger.io/hubfs/teleport_symbol@4.png)
Teleport 
“Suger has transformed Cloud GTM process by fully automating co-sell engagements and pipeline synchronization. With Suger, our team can now focus on building strategic relationships and accelerating deal velocity.”
![fireblocks](https://www.suger.io/hubfs/fireblocks.jpg)
Fireblocks 
BEST CUSTOMERS WORK WITH US

generated_description:
### Suger: Simplifying Cloud Marketplace Transactions

**Overview:**
Founded in 2022 and based in San Mateo, California, Suger is a startup that aims to revolutionize the way B2B software products operate within cloud marketplaces, specifically Amazon Web Services (AWS), Microsoft Azure, and Google Cloud Platform (GCP). Having recently emerged from Y Combinator's Batch W23, the company is already making waves in a market that thrives on accessibility and efficiency.

**Mission:**
Suger’s mission is clear-cut: to create a Salesforce-like experience for cloud marketplaces. They recognize that while these platforms might resemble an App Store for businesses, navigating them can be daunting. The upfront technical investment required, along with uncertainty about returns, often discourages potential sellers. Suger effectively removes this barrier, allowing companies to leverage existing cloud budgets while expediting procurement by as much as 40%.

**What They Do:**
With a lean team of six, Suger provides a suite of services that streamline the marketplace experience:
- **Marketplace Management:** Tools to simplify listing, transacting, and co-selling of software offerings.
- **Co-Sell Feature:** Integrates directly with CRMs to manage referrals and deals with cloud providers like AWS, Azure, and GCP.
- **Metering & Billing Solutions:** Converts raw usage data into actionable billing reports with seamless integrations.

**Why Choose Suger?**
- **No Need for Technical Overhaul:** Suger eliminates the hassle of hiring engineers or spending on consultants with ready-to-use solutions.
- **API-First Approach:** Their technology supports easy integrations with existing business tools, enhancing workflow without significant overhead.
- **Proven Results:** Customers like Astrix Security and Fireblocks sing praises for the efficiency and support provided by Suger, testament to their effectiveness in streamlining marketplace transactions.

**Target Market:**
Suger is ideally positioned for businesses looking to capitalize on cloud marketplaces without the common pitfalls. Their focus on B2B software products allows them to cater to a high-demand sector eager for efficiency.

**Joining the Cloud Revolution:**
As marketplaces continue to grow—nearly doubling in size year-on-year—Suger stands poised to be a key player. Their proactive approach in removing barriers to entry means they aren’t just a service provider; they’re a crucial partner in adapting to the evolving landscape of cloud software sales.

**Contact Suger:**
For companies eager to dive into this marketplace revolution, Suger can be reached through their [website](https://www.suger.io/) for demos and inquiries. If you’re part of the cloud software ecosystem and want to simplify your operations, Suger might just be the partner you need to propel your business forward. 

In a world where cloud budgets are up for grabs, Suger is here to help you capture market share effortlessly.
